Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text:
â€¢ Sure, I can do that.

The people have spoken and the economy is feeling the pressure; with rising living costs, interest rates and financial worries, Australians are struggling to make ends meet. Power bills are on the rise and disconnections are increasing, while the Australian dollar is feeling the heat of global financial turmoil. Added to this, predictions for the economy have been revised downwards, and opinions remain divided on the Reserve Bank of Australia's next rate move. It's a tough time for all, but with resilience and a positive attitude, we can weather this storm.
